data.name: InstructionAccepted_Corporate
data.value:

This to notify you that <%#valuerName#%> has accepted the instruction you issued.

kindly click on the link below to go to your dashboard

data.name: UserAccount-Confirmation
data.value:
Activate Your Account
We just need to validate your email address to activate your gosmartvalue.com account. Simply click the following button:
Activate my account
If the link doesn’t work, copy this URL into your browser:
<%#activationLink#%>
Your property awaits - goSmartValue.com!
The goSmartValue team.

data.name: UserAccount-PasswordReset
data.value:
Password Reset
You are receiving this email because your requested a password for your gosmartvalue.com account. Simply click the Reset Password button below:
Reset Password
If the link doesn’t work, copy this URL into your browser:
<%#resetLink#%>
Your property awaits - goSmartValue.com!
The goSmartValue team.
